folder: Center Street & St. Patricks Place, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Center Street - St. Patricks Place
text:
(1)

256 Center Street, at the S.E. corner of St. Patricks Place, showing St. Patricks Academy. In 1874 this was the D. H. Cortelyou house. The view is eastward
along Center Street.

June 13, 1927

P. L. Sperr

(2)

Another view of St. Patricks Academy, and St. Patricks Roman Catholic Church on St. Patricks Place.

May 5, 1930

P. L. Sperr

(3)

The same as View 2, at a later date.

May 6, 1936

P. L. Sperr

folder: Center Street & St. Patricks Place, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Center Street - St. Patricks Place
text:
Center Street, east from St. Patricks Place (Richmond). In the center, on the right, is the Holtmann Bakery at No. 240.

May 5, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.
